pages.disclaimer: Important Information - Disclaimer at Starlight Sky Rooms Casino (18+) Contacts Booking Disclaimer Welcome to Starlight Sky, a premier hotel-casino destination in India. We are thrilled to have you as our guest and hope that your stay with us is a memorable and enjoyable experience. However, before you embark on your journey at our hotel-casino, we would like to provide you with some important information and disclaimers, particularly regarding our casino operations. At Starlight Sky, we take pride in offering a world-class casino experience to our guests. Our casino floor is meticulously designed to provide a luxurious and fun-filled environment for those who seek excitement and entertainment. With a wide range of games, including slot machines, table games, and poker tournaments, our casino is sure to cater to every type of player. While we strive to create a safe and responsible gaming environment, it is important to understand that gambling can be addictive and may lead to financial problems for some individuals. We encourage our guests to gamble responsibly and to set limits on their gaming activities. If you or someone you know is experiencing difficulties with gambling, we urge you to seek help from a professional organization that specializes in gambling addiction. In adherence to Indian laws and regulations, all guests must be at least 21 years of age to gamble at our casino. Valid identification is required upon entry to verify age and identity. Minors are not permitted on the casino floor or to participate in any gambling activities. Please be aware that gambling is a form of entertainment and should not be viewed as a means to make money. While some guests may be fortunate enough to win at the casino, it is important to remember that the odds are always in favor of the house. Therefore, it is essential to gamble with discretion and only wager what you can afford to lose. Starlight Sky promotes responsible gaming practices and offers resources for guests who may need assistance with managing their gambling habits. Our staff is trained to identify signs of problem gambling and can provide information on support services available in the local community. We are committed to ensuring that our guests have a safe and enjoyable experience at our casino. In addition to our casino offerings, Starlight Sky also features luxurious accommodations, exquisite dining options, and a variety of entertainment and leisure activities for guests to enjoy. From relaxing at our spa and swimming pool to attending live performances and events, there is something for everyone at our hotel-casino. We hope that your time at Starlight Sky is filled with excitement, relaxation, and unforgettable moments. Should you have any questions or concerns during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to our friendly staff who are always available to assist you. Thank you for choosing Starlight Sky as your destination for a truly exceptional hotel-casino experience. We look forward to welcoming you and ensuring that your stay with us is nothing short of extraordinary. Enjoy your time with us and may luck be on your side at our casino. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +91 24 5399 6655 StarlightSky@gmail.com TB Rd, Thrissur, Kerala 680021, India

I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great vacation destination." 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +91 24 5399 6655 StarlightSky@gmail.com TB Rd, Thrissur, Kerala 680021, India document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); const cookiesChoice = localStorage.getItem("cookiesChoice"); if (cookiesChoice === "accepted") { cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } else if (cookiesChoice === "declined") { cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } else { cookieNotification.style.display = "block"; } }); function acceptCookies() { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); localStorage.setItem("cookiesChoice", "accepted"); cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } function declineCookies() { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); localStorage.setItem("cookiesChoice", "declined"); cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; }
pages.policy: Protecting Your Information - Privacy Policy at Starlight Sky Rooms Casino (18+) Contacts Booking Privacy Policy Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us by phone at +91 24 5399 6655 or in writing at the following address: Starlight Sky Hotel-Casino, TB Rd, Thrissur, Kerala 680021, India What Information Do We Collect? At Starlight Sky Hotel-Casino, we may collect personal information such as name, address, email address, phone number, and payment information when you make reservations, sign up for our loyalty program, or participate in promotions and events. What Do We Do With the Information? The information we collect is used to provide you with the best possible experience at our hotel-casino. We may use your information to process reservations, communicate with you about promotions and events, and personalize your stay with us. We may also use your information for marketing purposes, but we will always give you the option to opt out of receiving marketing communications. Membership Database: If you sign up for our loyalty program, your information will be stored in our membership database. This database helps us track your preferences, rewards, and activity at our hotel-casino. Your membership information is confidential and will not be shared with third parties without your consent. Security: We take the security of your information seriously and have implemented measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. We use encryption technology to safeguard your information during online transactions. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Encryption: Our website uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption to protect your personal information when you make reservations or payments online. SSL encryption ensures that your data is encrypted and secure during transmission. What Are Cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your browser or device when you visit a website. Cookies help the website remember your preferences and track your activity for a more personalized experience. How We Use Cookies: At Starlight Sky Hotel-Casino, we use cookies to enhance your experience on our website and improve our services. By using cookies, we can remember your preferences, track your activity, and analyze website traffic to better understand our guests' needs. The Cookies We Use: Site Preferences Cookies: These cookies remember your preferences, such as language and region settings, to provide you with a customized experience on our website. Third Party Cookies: We may use third party cookies from partners such as Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and improve our services. These cookies help us track user activity and gather data for statistical purposes. Disabling Cookies: If you wish to disable cookies, you can do so through your browser settings. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect your experience on our website and limit certain features. In conclusion, at Starlight Sky Hotel-Casino, we are committed to protecting your privacy and keeping your personal information secure. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us by phone or in writing. Thank you for choosing Starlight Sky for your hospitality needs. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +91 24 5399 6655 StarlightSky@gmail.com TB Rd, Thrissur, Kerala 680021, India
pages.terms: Understanding Our Rules - Terms and Conditions at Starlight Sky Rooms Casino (18+) Contacts Booking Terms and Conditions Welcome to Starlight Sky, a premier hotel-casino in India where luxury meets entertainment. Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before making a reservation or visiting our property. 1. The Logo: The Starlight Sky logo is a registered trademark of our company and may not be used or reproduced without prior written consent. Any unauthorized use of our logo is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action. 2. Non-endorsement: Starlight Sky does not endorse any third-party products, services, or websites that are not directly affiliated with our company. We are not responsible for the content or actions of any such third parties. 3. Warranties: While we strive to provide the best possible experience for our guests, Starlight Sky cannot guarantee the availability of all amenities or services at all times. We reserve the right to make changes to our offerings without prior notice. 4. Limitations of liability: In no event shall Starlight Sky be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your stay at our hotel-casino. We are not responsible for any loss or damage to personal belongings, injuries, or accidents on our premises. 5. Copyright Information: All content on the Starlight Sky website, including text, images, and videos, is protected by copyright laws. Guests may not use, copy, or distribute our content without permission. 6. Reservation | Re-confirmation | Cancellation Policy: To make a reservation at Starlight Sky, guests must provide valid credit card information and contact details. Reservations are subject to availability and confirmation by our staff. Re-confirmation may be required closer to the arrival date. 7. Cancellation policy: Cancellations made 24 hours or more before the check-in date will not incur any charges. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the check-in date will be subject to a one-night stay charge. No-shows will be charged for the full reservation amount. 8. FOR RESERVATIONS AND INFORMATION: For reservations, inquiries, or more information about Starlight Sky, please contact our reservations team at +91 24 5399 6655 or StarlightSky@gmail.com. Our staff is available 24/7 to assist you with your booking needs. We hope you enjoy your stay at Starlight Sky and have a memorable experience at our hotel-casino in India. Thank you for choosing us as your destination for luxury and entertainment. 18+ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer +91 24 5399 6655 StarlightSky@gmail.com TB Rd, Thrissur, Kerala 680021, India
